source.methodName: public String deleteFileByID(@MatrixVariable Map<String, String> retrieveParameters)

sink.statement: res = DriverManager.getConnection("jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/mysql", "", "").createStatement().executeQuery("SELECT * FROM  EMPLOYEE where EID=" + employeeID);
sink.methodName: public String deleteFileByID(@MatrixVariable Map<String, String> retrieveParameters)

findings.description:
The user can send a employee id over a MatrixVariable annotation. The handler method returns the data of that employee stored in a database. SQL injection vulnerability exists.

curl http://localhost:8080/retrieve/EID=1%20OR%201%20=%201;ENAME=dummy
